EXECORD.HD: Amending Executive Order 13261 on the Order of Succession in the Environmental Protection Agency
EXECORD.FP: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including the Federal Vacancies Reform Act of 1998, 5 U.S.C. 3345, et seq., it is hereby ordered that Executive Order 13261 of March 19, 2002, is amended as follows:
Section 1. In section 2, subsections (a), (b), and (c) are deleted and replaced with the following new subsections (a), (b), and (c):
EXECORD.P: (a) Assistant Administrator, Office of Solid Waste;
